00029  * Revision 1.0  1996/ Pierre    Initial revision
00030  *
00031  *  VME_CLEAR_1151 (base);              Clear all 16 channels
00032  *  VME_READ_1151 (base, d, r);         Read r channels starting from channel 0
00033   *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00034 #ifndef _vme_h_
00035 #define _vme_h_
00036 #include "vxWorks.h"
00037 #include "vme.h"
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #define A32D24         0xf0000000       /* A32D16 access */
00041 
00042 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00043 #define VME_CLEAR_1151(_vmebase){\
00044                                    {\
00045                                       static DWORD _ll, _dummy, *_local, __r=16;\
00046                                       _ll = _vmebase;\
00047                                       _local =(DWORD *)( ((_ll << 8) | 0x40) | A32D24);\
00048                                       while (__r > 0) {\
00049                                                 _dummy = *_local;\
00050                                                 _local++;\
00051                                                 __r--;}\
00052                                   }\
00053                                }
00054 
00055 #define VME_READ_1151(_vmebase,_d,_r){\
00056                                         {\
00057                                            DWORD _ll, *_local, __r;\
00058                                            _ll = _vmebase;\
00059                                            _local = (DWORD *) (((_ll << 8) | 0x80) | A32D24);\
00060                                            __r =_r;\
00061                                            if (__r > 16) __r = 16;\
00062                                            while (__r > 0) {\
00063                                                 *_d++ = *_local++;\
00064                                                 __r--;}\
00065                                        }\
00066                                     }
00067 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
